narrative.narrative: Thai Smaile is a subsidiary of Thai International that began operation in July 2012. They call BKK home and Bangkoks older airport Don Mueang a second home. They serve 9 domestic destinations and 10 international across Asia. They have 15 A320s and will have 20 by 2015 and have options for 5 more. They are branded as a low cost carrier and offer seat selection and check in service and snacks and drinks and bags up to 20kg with no additional charge.
